advancements.thinair.air_bladder.descrip: Use an Air Bladder to refill your air supply on the go
advancements.thinair.air_bladder.title: In and Out
advancements.thinair.blue_air.descriptio: Breathe the life force given off by Soul Fire to maintain your air (but not increase it!)
advancements.thinair.blue_air.title: Deep Blues
advancements.thinair.disco_lantern.descr: Use a piece of Dye to manually change the color of a Safety Lamp (you can scrape the color off with an axe)
advancements.thinair.disco_lantern.title: Red Light! Green Light!
advancements.thinair.respirator.descript: Protect yourself from choking air with something like a Respirator
advancements.thinair.respirator.title: I'd Take a Deep Breath...
advancements.thinair.root.description: The air is not always breathable deep in the world and in other dimensions
advancements.thinair.root.title: Thin Air
advancements.thinair.safety_lantern.desc: Use a Safety Lantern to check the air quality around you
advancements.thinair.signal_torch.descri: Right-click a torch to make it spew particles, perhaps to signal the exit of a cave
advancements.thinair.signal_torch.title: Ooh, ES-CAPE
advancements.thinair.soulfire_bottle.des: Restore your lungs with the souls trapped in a Bottle of Soulfire
advancements.thinair.water_breathing.des: Breathe freely where there is no air at all
